entry.title: We Have a Website!
entry.content:
Digits is in the process of launching Phase I of a multi-phase project to bring containers to digital humanities. Digits.pub is the first of several public-facing websites we plan to develop in the coming months, but this will be our main website for things like announcements, general information, and links.

Watch This Space for Updates.
entry.summary: Digits is in the process of launching Phase I of a multi-phase project to bring containers to digital humanities. Digits.pub is the first of several public-facing websites we plan to develop in the coming months, but this will be our main website for things like announcements, general information, and links.
